column5: I am new to fishing on the great lakes for salmon. I was out on lake huron this weekend and out about 3-4 miles, fishing in depths from 15' to 30'. I have a fairly good size selection of spoons and plugs but I didn't have any luck. I was told that I didn't need to use flashers with this selection of lures. Can anyone offer me some tips on what I should be doing. Sorry for the vague question
Welcome to the board - you might want to check www.spoonpullers.com as well.
